p: In addition, duplicate genes that lack coding potential, such as PTENP1, can also be expressed and while not translated function as LINC RNAs (in this case acting as a sponge for microRNAs that target the parent PTEN transcript). In each case classifying duplicates into putatively functional and non-functional categories would misclassify TP53RTG, LIF6, and PTENP1.
